website_summaries.verdict: The best all-around option for an ultra sleek, ultra modern bar cart.
pros: Unique shelving design provides a lot of organization in a small package
Easy to assemble and very sturdy
Great choice for a small bar set
cons: Doesn't hold larger bar and drink sets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful - easy to DIY
customer_reviews.text: Such a sturdy and beautiful bar cart. Read the instructions first. They are very confusing and I consider myself fairly good at putting together things of the sort. Make sure you read the instructions beginning to end BEFORE you start constructing it. I really wanted a gold bar cart, but couldn't find one for a price in my budget. So I bought this one, spray painted the frame gold, and put marble contact paper on the glass shelves. It comes with little suction cups that help hold the glass shelves in place once set on the frames. All in all, it is a very well-made, quality material, very sturdy product. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! We live in a smaller condo and it looks great in our living room and it is great for entertaining guests and easy to decorate. Funny thing is I put the top or the middle on wrong and ended up having the wine glasses hang on the wrong side but I actually like it this way and it freed up another shelf so...that was lucky. Anyways if you want a quality looking cart pick this one. I choose to leave the wheels off but there are wheels that come with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle and Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality cart that looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the box was extremely heavy, which to me is a good sign. Then I opened it and at first I was overwhelmed by parts. Don't be! It is very simple to put together and they supply you with everything you need! No screw driver required. In the end, I love it and wouldn't trade it for anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I had no room in my kitchen w wine glasses (housewarming gift) and leftover wines (from parties). This is a great organizer, time saver, & the gun metal color looks super chic & modern. It was so easy to put together you don’t even need tools. (Time consuming, but easy). I put up pix so people can get an idea, of what it looks like in a real hone, but I know I have a lot of work to do in terms of styling. Looking forward to buying bar tools. :)
customer_reviews.author: lindsnix

customer_reviews.title: Organize your bar and look classy in the process! Just be prepared to put in some work
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar cart if you are looking to consolidate all of your boozy items into one mobile, sleek area. I love how it has multiple shelves of various heights (tall enough to fit even Costco sized handles). Assembly was pretty easy and I managed to put it together by myself in a matter of about an hour. There was an issue however with several of the holes not being completely drilled out. Some of them had little pieces of metal protruding out which made it incredibly difficult to screw in the screws. But i was able to knock most of them off with a small screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Johnston

customer_reviews.title: beautifully designed
customer_reviews.text: This was the nicest bar cart for the value proposition. Comes with easy installation instructions. The design and size are perfect. Be sure to measure out the dimensions before purchasing to ensure size matches where you plan to put it. I would've liked the glasses holder to hold more glasses, but it's ok. Each row holds three 20oz wine glasses or 5oz snifters. Would've liked it to hold four, but this is ok. I've compared to some $500+ ones and this one looks just as great, if not better.
customer_reviews.author: oel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bar cart and expensive look!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, one of my best purchases. This cart is strong, heavy, and exactly what I was looking for. I followed the other reviewers and turned the middle shelf around, it’s perfect... highly recommend this adjustment. The gun metal and black glass are impressive. Looks way more expensive than it is. I just used the other reviewers pictures to assemble, took and hour or so but pleased. (Directions are not great but easy to assemble)
customer_reviews.author: Brent/WashDC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart, and purchased two of them. One of the wheels fell off 1 about 8 months after purchasing. I thought it was the wheel itself which needed to be replaced. Called to order a replacement. Didn't receive them, had to call again, and then didn't receive until after 1 year went by. Tried to put the new wheel on, but it must be the thread on the inside of the frame because the wheel will absolutely not go in the hole! Not sure why this is happening. Make sure you get whatever replacements you need before the year is up. Beautiful item, was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Quality Home Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar. I bought is as a small present for my husband's den. It's sturdy and doesn't look cheap. He's stocked it up and decorated with bar drinking glasses since this photo. Zero complaints. The instructions were not too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Banza Townsend Tracey

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bar cart! The price is so good compared to other carts I was shopping for and it’s big with plenty of space. The only downside is it’s scratched easily but luckily the bottom and top glass are the same size so they’re interchangeable if the scratches are too noticeable. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: The bar cart looks beautiful in our living room
customer_reviews.text: The bar cart looks beautiful in our living room. It's not hard to put this together, but you most likely will need two people, as my wife and it did it together in about an hour. The instructions are very good visual instructions. Allow time to assemble because there are about 40 screws to put in. Not at all difficult, just time consuming. That should NOT deter you from purchasing this bar cart. My wife and I are very happy with our purchase. It's a good sturdy, well designed piece. Hope this review helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pcs in both Original & Replacement orders
customer_reviews.text: My friend owns this exact bar cart and I loved it so much, I decided to purchase it for myself. However, I wish the manufacturer had better quality control. My original order contained a backwards piece (the corner to connect the screw was welded on backwards) and I couldn’t get a replacement piece - I had to pack and ship the ENTIRE bar cart to send back. When my replacement order arrived, I was missing assembly pieces (no L key and missing washer pcs), and the glass on the second level pops up a bit, it won’t lay flat. Overall I still love my bar cart. Just frustrated with the incorrect and missing assembly pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Chenda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This cart came out even better than I expected. It was very easy to assemble and only took about an hour to do so. It is extremely functional, spacious, and sturdy. It can fit up to 16 wine glasses, including martini glasses and flutes. It holds four wine bottles with room underneath for syrups, soda, etc. I never write reviews but this cart deserved one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look, functional and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the look and feel of this bar cart. After reading the reviews I hired an assembler to come and put it together... it only took him 15 minutes. 👌🏿. So, it may not be as difficult to put together for some. I wish that I would have tried to assemble myself. Once the bar was up I was very impressed with the look and feel. I was expecting the cart to be smaller than it was and to my surprise is was a lot taller than I thought. I have enjoyed decorating it and find it a nice piece of furniture at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Brea WJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall
customer_reviews.text: Some instructions are wrong, so you need to figure it out. It is not the highest quality item, but adequate for the price. Something that at ten feet looks great, and will certainly do the job. Glass seems a little too thin, so I would be careful with weight.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size!
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is MASSIVE. Perfect if you entertain or are into mixing cocktails. We spray painted the bars black to get rid of the gray color and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I am rarely inspired to write a product review. This is exceptional. The shipping was super fast, everything was packaged well and nothing was broken or missing. I am a white-collar 49 year old female professional with little experience in 3D furniture instructions, and had absolutely no problem putting it together. It is an incredible value for the price and looks great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The crown jewel of my new apartment
customer_reviews.text: What's the best place for drinks in town? Oh, that's right, it's my dining room. This bar cart is so much bigger than I thought it was, but I'm not complaining. There's lots of space for bottles of liquor, my decanter, a bowl of citrus, wine, assorted drinkware, and accessories. I'm obsessed with it and can't wait to keep styling it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gump

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this bar for over a year now and I love it, its so sleek. Upon receiving it there was some issues with the building process since one piece didn't have the proper pre drilled holes, but that being said I contacted customer service and they immediately handled the matter and sent me a replacement piece. I built this alone and it was simple, I do use it often and the compartments for holding the wine and and glasses is a great addition. Its really roomy and holds a lot of everything I need it to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Several of the screws were stripped, not all of the pieces were labeled for the instructions, and the metal frame was the wrong shape in three places. If you’re going to pay over $100 for something, it should be sent in working order. I would say it’s worth about $40.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Check the Wheels Before Beginning
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to try the wheels prior to beginning assembly. My son and I made it all the way to that step, only to discover one wheel would absolutely not go in, no matter what we tried. That wasn’t a major problem, because my floor is carpeted so the wheels weren’t an absolute necessity for me. My biggest issue is the fact the glass on the bottom shelf does not fit properly, meaning the pieces aren’t exact. This is only on the bottom, all the other pieces fit perfectly. It’s too much of a hassle to take apart, because the glass is the final step, so I’m just going to keep it and deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenita Boleware

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I went with this bar cart! It looks great and is a lot bigger than I thought. The only issue I had was putting it together alone and it would’ve been much easier if another person helped.
customer_reviews.author: Hmorris9

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth the Buy!! It's Tall.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing and I must say I was afraid of the assembly. Needless to say, it was not hard to assemble at all as long as you read the instructions. I recruited my 17 year old son to assist me and we assembled in about an hour. Tons of screws. I would recommend an electric screw driver thingy. I actually prefer the original color. It is taller than I expected. I opted to use wheels because I may need to move it when entertaining to accommodate guest. I'm excited to decorate it now. It was totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: The cart came with clear instructions and looks pretty good from a distance. The main problem is that not all of the holes were drilled well - the cart is wobbly, and I even had to take a cobalt-tipped drill bit to one to open it up enough to get the screw in (there was a metal shard blocking part of the hole). Additionally, the metal frame had a couple of scratches on it upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and customizable!
customer_reviews.text: I read a customers review before I got this because the design looked great but I was really looking for a different color and Walla there it was a gold frame! I also was able to save money by buying the black and changing the color myself! Great product, sturdy, easy to put together and good price! It also looked way better then the others in the price range!
customer_reviews.author: ladina whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Overall, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the parts didn't fit perfectly so have somebody around with you when you're building it just in case you need to hold something in place/slightly bend the piece when you're screwing it in. Otherwise, it's perfect. I'm pretty much useless when it comes to putting things together and I was able to do to it alone (barring the one piece that I needed my friend to bend while I screwed it in). Very sturdy, wheels move very easily, very sleek design. I put marble contact paper on the black panels and it looks nice! Overall, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joette Carini

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Mobile Bar
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect cart for me! Originally I wanted something to mix drinks on for a birthday party. It also came in handy at Christmas to hold punch and bottles of soda. Now, it's a great storage place. It did take a little time to put together, but we went slowly and read the directions very carefully. It is really beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Crvttchck77

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. The quality is excellent and it wasn't hard to put together. It was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eli - SC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart was very easy to put together and looks so nice in our dining room. All the parts are assembled with a hex screw, they only provide one but we had another laying around which made assembly much faster. But it would absolutely be possible with one person. It was heavy to bring into our house, but individual parts are not heavy when assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my home! Before assembly, I spray painted the silver a beaten, copper color and it pairs nicely with the black, tempered glass shelves. This bar cart was easy to assemble and is fully functional! Great size!
customer_reviews.author: O. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stand
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this purchase! It’s a beautiful stand. Even better in person. Love that it has storage for wine bottles and stemware. I was concerned about the glass top and shelves, but it gives such an elegant look.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Receive many compliments on this cart
customer_reviews.text: I only had one issue with the wine rack being not completely welded together on a small section on one side. The company insisted on sending me a replacement. I just switched out the new part for the broken one so it was not necessary to disassemble the old cart and reassemble the new. I love this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Page

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cart
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bar cart. I am to fit many large bottles of liquor and wine on the shelves. The tops are black glass which look very nice with the gray metal frame.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great cart, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart as a gift. Some reviews mentioned that assembly was a challenge, so I put it together myself rather than gifting someone that challenge. I found that the assembly was straight forward, though some of the diagrams can be puzzling. I was very happy with the quality of the pieces and the finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together...
customer_reviews.text: An evening? A couple of hours? You better set aside a whole day to put this thing together. Instructions aren't clear enough so you can easily put together the pieces backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but no hardware
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this piece but it didnt come with any hardware!! I didnt realize until after it was out of the box and we had painted it. The only way to contact amazon about this was to return it, which we obviously couldnt do. CHECK YOUR BOX AS SOON AS YOU GET IT. We ended up being able to find screws that would work at the hardware store, and we liked it so much I gave it 2 stars even with all the hassle. It is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Guests Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a new house a couple months ago with some roommates and (being guys in our early 20’s) we had a hard time decorating/creating an adult-ish space. This bar cart totally was the answer. It tied the whole room together and everyone who comes over compliments us on it. It’s great for entertaining and looks fantastic tucked away in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Logan G

customer_reviews.title: ready to get the party started with this bar cart
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping (arrived earlier than suggested). easy to assemble with no tools necessary. looks sturdy. only reason for 4 stars is because it’s slightly larger then expected which isn’t necessarily a negative thing but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I’m so happy I purchased this before the holidays. It was perfect to hold all the drinks and plates of appetizers.
customer_reviews.author: JOYANN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product a little difficult to assemble with a lot of broken Styrofoam from packaging once assembled it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Conflitti

customer_reviews.title: Sexy,  classy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the photo of this item however I was BLOWN away by the classy/elegant look once put together. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tynie

customer_reviews.title: I been looking for a perfect bar and I found it...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar it’s a must have for Me....i had so many bottles of liquor and wine but nowhere to store them...I have bar accessories as well..I have drinking glasses & wine glasses & martini glasses & shot glasses....It Holds everything I have...My oldest Sonshine put it together for Me he said was easy to assemble...This bar is perfect I love it..
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and looks great in pretty much any room of the house. We got this as a gift for our friend, and he loved it! The cart can hold several items, and the wheels help keep it mobile.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. Bigger than I expected but fits in the space nicely. nice amount of room for storage
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Payne

customer_reviews.title: put the wheels in first and check both section parts having wheels inserted for problem(s)
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it was put together (no easy task either) one wheel snapped off. See the picture it is not the wheel itself it is stabilizing internal leg piece that keeps the wheel on the cart. On the top of the picture, the screw, the square piece belongs inside of leg part (f). Now a three legged cart. Oh this is a beautiful piece, I had it put together, then took it apart for return
customer_reviews.author: Klarkie

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk, the bolt holes weren’t the right size, so I wasn’t even able to get mine assembled. For the price I expected something at least nicer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functionality and Design
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than most bar carts. Plenty of room and stylish. I sell homes for a living and see a lot of bar carts. I think this beats most in functionality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. Easy to assemble. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I waited for this item to drop in price before purchasing just in case it wasn't as great a quality as it appeared. Boy do I feel stupid and smart. Stupid because the quality is excellent and smart for getting on a deal. It is heavy but looks nice. I got it to use as a nightstand. I copied one of the reviews and spray painted the metal to the color I wanted. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got this to have a bar cart in my living room. Absolutely love this and it was super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love my wine cart
customer_reviews.text: I love my wine cart. instructions are fairly straight forward and can be done in an hour or two. It looks good. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Harlem's Own

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what they promised!
customer_reviews.text: It's tall, sturdy, easy to assemble, and looks JUST like the photo. Comes with all the tools necessary to build, and I had it put together and in place in no time. I love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Forest

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions were not the best but fortunately my husband is handy and didn’t have ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely live this mini bar! Assembly instructions were not the best but fortunately my husband is handy and didn’t have a problem putting it together. It’s very classy and has a ton of room for all your alcohol! Ordered it on Jan 26th and wasn’t expecting it until February but it arrived two days later. Highly recommend this cart!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Stearns

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: its perfect! looks great in our kitchen nook area our cocktail.beverage server looks fantastic we get copliments on it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Gina H

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bar cart for my first apartment and this was perfect for me!!! I used marble contact paper and love how it came out. This cart is surprisingly a little bigger than I expected! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leila M

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, practical and handy
customer_reviews.text: i love the look and feel of it, rolls easily, holds so much and makes my cooking and backing easy and attractive. Love, it
customer_reviews.author: R Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great Use of Space
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this bar cart gorgeous in person (I don't think the photos do it justice), compared to other bar carts on the market, this one gives you SO much shelf space! We were hunting for a bit and I'm so glad we settled on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dans

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched and s
customer_reviews.text: Cart arrived with several metal pieces scratched as well as scratches on the black tempered glass. Package was extremely heavy and not worth the effort to even try to return so I assembled it and will keep it despite the flaws. Was also missing two rubber cups for the glass holders. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar. It is sturdy and looks amazing in my apartment. Not kinky does it look good, it’s easy to clean as well. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: James.W

customer_reviews.title: It comes with an Allen key, a screw driver with an Allen head would help but is not necessary
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, the instructions are very simple. It took about one hour to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Feist

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bar cart!! We love it!! It was larger then expected but everything fits. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Scrank

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but Poorly crafted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, stylish, functional. POORLY crafted. The screws don’t tighten enough to support the weight of the shelves. Wish I would have known. Need to be able to support more than a few bottles on the primary bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Calloway

customer_reviews.title: Great barcart, confusing instructions at the beginning
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. I been wanting a bar cart in my apartment for quite some time. I turned it into a coffee and liquor bar. PIt looks really good. I will say the instructions do get confusing at the beginning. I had to undo the bar cart a few times. The instructions I got had one part where it looked like someone put whiteout over some of the instructions and written in the letters. Regardless, I would buy again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: mariah chase

customer_reviews.title: appears great. However
customer_reviews.text: For the price, appears great. However, the instructions were a little off leading to a couple frustrating hours of redoing the assembly. Also, the pieces had several scratches, but they are only noticeable close up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and all the pieces are perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband's birthday. He loves it! It was easy to assemble and all the pieces are perfect for what we needed. We especially like the wine bottle holders, it's like two products in one!
customer_reviews.author: Tierney McCallister

customer_reviews.title: This is a beauty
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It’s sleek and modern and sturdy and matches decor
customer_reviews.author: Chjna

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with this product.. it’s very Sturdy, the institution instruction was clear. It’s a nice bar cart and it’s holding capacity is great.. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ricko

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my needs and a beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Using for a TV cart so did not attach wire racks for glasses. This is perfect for my needs and a beautiful cart
customer_reviews.author: LoKy

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart. The elegant yet industrial look matches my place and style perfectly. The black glass tops are especially awesome. Wine glasses and bottles fit perfectly in their place. The entire cart is very sturdy yet easy to move around. Just make sure you carefully follow the assembly instructions. I had to take it apart halfway through building it because I had a few pieces backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nick V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BAR CART very study, very nice, cross between modern and industrial, glides smoothly and has locking feet
customer_reviews.author: Sachi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sugar smack's birthday. He was so pleased with it. It looks great in the spot that we've put it in... just right size excellent quality and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected but looks nice and is pretty study. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: asreadby_yas

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bar cart. I love the black tempered glass and design. The price was amazing. I'm extremely happy with this purchase. I highly recommend this bar cart. Very easy to assemble. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: We loved the cart and purchased it at the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved the cart and purchased it at the end of February. At the end of May a wheel fell off and it is completely stripped, which means there's a product defect. Still trying to figure out how to return it since it is a third-party vendor.
customer_reviews.author: zelrebels

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart. I spray painted it gold and I am very pleased with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Ruiz/Yulonda Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with lot of space
customer_reviews.text: This a great addition to my living room area. Although a bit larger than I anticipated, the sleek design elements are open enough that it doesn't feel bulky. Hold a ton so that the casters really make it easy to move as needed.
customer_reviews.author: steven e geyer

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this seller was amazing. The item arrived much earlier than the quoted ...
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this seller was amazing. The item arrived much earlier than the quoted shipping date. The cart itself was easy to assemble when following the included instructions and tools. It is also beautiful when all put together!!
customer_reviews.author: HotWheels

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice even finish, easy to assemble, sturdy, good assembly design. I don’t see this getting loose, wiggly or coming apart. It is sturdy and rolls very nice even on thicker carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bar cart
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar cart! Fits perfectly in my dining room and gives everything a little class. Also great for extra storage
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Really looks great. A breeze to put together. Probably about 45 minutes tops to assemble and clean up the protectant foam.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: sleek look with tons of room
customer_reviews.text: We weren't looking for a large bar cart but this one stood out because of all the shelf space. It was easy to assemble and came without any broken pieces or scratches. I don't know what we did before having this bar cart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Directions weren’t the best but product is well made and trendy
customer_reviews.author: moneer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly nervous getting something like this online knowing I would have to assemble it. Assembly only took about 1 hour and it looks great! Tons of storage and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Nice size indoor outdoor bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Nice size indoor outdoor bar cart. Shelves are nicely spaced for a variety of items. Would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: But once set up it is sturdy and looks great in my home
customer_reviews.text: Setting up took about 2 hours. But once set up it is sturdy and looks great in my home.
customer_reviews.author: jedwards206

customer_reviews.title: however without them is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really beatiful and fancy! Just thought a little high with the small wheels, however without them is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shattered but overall good product.
customer_reviews.text: came with a shattered panel, nobody could provide me new panel accepted 40% cashback but wouldve been much happier with a full bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: kaine

customer_reviews.title: Parts don’t fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed because one of the holes wasn’t big enough for the weel and now the cart is uneven since the wheel wouldn’t fit. Otherwise everything else was great about the cart.
customer_reviews.author: SavannahElaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bar cart
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Got it for him for Christmas for a small Boston apartment and it is perfect. Stylish, practical yet doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Leenie S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the multiple levels. Nice size & taller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy stylish wine bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase of this wine bar cart! Caution: package is very heavy about 65lbs. Easy to put together, lots of screws, me and my 18 yr old daughter put this cart together, very sturdy stylish wine bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.text: My product came scratched and a few pieces that hold up the glass are bent. Highly disappointed and unattractive
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gray

customer_reviews.title: I’m Satisfied with with buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my bar! It helped to upgrade the look of my room and give me storage for all my alcohol and bar stuff! Taller than I expected it to be too.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to put all our liquor bottles and shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin U.

customer_reviews.title: This cart works great. Very durable and the wheels make very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This cart works great. Very durable and the wheels make very easy to move around if need be. It got the alcohol cabinet and everything off the top of the refer on to the cart. Good looking also.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Two main bolt points were not machined properly
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks great I had to go to a hardware store and find bolts to fit into two holes in the leg because there were no threads in the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful bar cart. Fairly easy to put together -- lots of screws-- but well worth the time invested.
customer_reviews.author: Super Woman 30

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bar cart! Super easy to put together, came quicker then expected & great packaging! Bigger than I anticipated & the perfect touch to my decor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keline Ajanoh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bar! It goes with our apartment perfectly. Not cheap looking at all. Def worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Orr

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nicely, was very easy to put together and is sturdy. Took about an hour to build and all the pieces were there. Definitely would recommended this bar cart.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha House

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass was broken and scratched. I couldn’t find a contact number to get the vendor to send new tempered glass.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: SEI Furniture Zephs Metal and Tempered Glass Locking Castor Wheels Bar Cart, 40 W x 16 D x 37.25 H, Gunmetal/Black
product_meta.description: This wonderful bar cart features an open, contemporary style and it can store 4 wine bottles and approximately 8 wine glasses. Dimensions include: Overall: 40"W x 16"D x 37.25" H Top surface: 33.75" W x 16" D (not including handle); Stemware storage space: 19.75" W x 16" D x 10.5" H; Shelves: 15.75" W x 16" D x 17.5" H (middle), 33.75" W x 16" D x 12.5" H (bottom); Clearance: 33.75" W x 16" D x 3.75" H. This one-of-a-kind item weighs approximately 62 pounds and can support up to 40 lbs. (per shelf), 5 lbs. (per wine bottle). Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: Powder-Coated Metal Tube, Iron Line, 5mm Tempered Glass. Assembly required. Made in China.
feature_bullets: Stores 4 wine bottles and approximately 8 wine glasses; Offers fast access to snacks and drinks
Open, contemporary style; Gunmetal gray finish w/ black tempered glass

Overall: 40" W x 16" D x 37.25" H; Top surface: 33.75" W x 16" D (without handle); Stemware storage space: 19.75" W x 16" D x 10.5" H; Shelves: 15.75" W x 16" D x 17.5" H (middle), 33.75" W x 16" D x 12.5" H (bottom); Clearance: 33.75" W x 16" D x 3.75" H
Materials: powder-coated metal tube, iron line, 5mm tempered glass; Support: 40 lb. (per shelf), 5 lb. (per wine bottle); Approx. weight: 62 lb.
Locking casters for mobility and functionality; Fashionable and functional
